headline: Tell HN: Firefox users don't need another secondary browser
description:
You probably use a secondary browser to login to work and personal accounts at the same time or check stuff with/ without add-ons, etc. If you love Firefox, you don't really have to put up with Chrome or Edge for this purpose.

You can use Firefox Developer Edition[1] as your secondary browser (while using Firefox at the same time).

Note - If you need a third or even a fourth browser, there is Firefox Beta and Firefox Nightly https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/channel/desktop/

[1] <https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/developer/>
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：火狐用户不需要另一个辅助浏览器
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：火狐用戶不需要另一個輔助瀏覽器
description_zh-Hans:
You probably use a secondary browser to login to work and personal accounts at the same time or check stuff with/ without add-ons, etc. 如果你喜欢Firefox，你真的不必为此忍受Chrome或Edge。

你可以使用Firefox开发者版[1]作为你的辅助浏览器（同时使用Firefox）。

注意--如果你需要第三个甚至第四个浏览器，有Firefox Beta和Firefox Nightly https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/channel/desktop/

[1] <https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/developer/>。
description_zh-Hant:
You probably use a secondary browser to login to work and personal accounts at the same time or check stuff with/ without add-ons, etc. 如果你喜歡Firefox，你真的不必為此忍受Chrome或Edge。

你可以使用Firefox開發者版[1]作為你的輔助瀏覽器（同時使用Firefox）。

注意--如果你需要第三個甚至第四個瀏覽器，有Firefox Beta和Firefox Nightly https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/channel/desktop/

[1] <https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/developer/>。
